name: blaze-slider
description: Blazing Fast Slider For High Performance Web

scripts.publish-patch: npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish --public
scripts.dist-cleanup: mv dist/blaze-slider.cjs.dev.d.ts dist/blaze-slider.d.ts && rm -f dist/blaze-slider.cjs.prod.d.ts dist/blaze-slider.esm.d.ts dist/blaze-slider.iife.d.ts dist/blaze-slider.min.d.ts
scripts.build: npm run lint && rollup -c && npm run dist-cleanup
